Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.14.2-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.14.2-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package helm is earlier than 3.14.2-6, affected by CVE-2025-22872
